scripts.transactions:process: docker-compose run --rm app yarn ts-node-dev src/tasks/processTransactions.ts
scripts.db:create: docker-compose exec db createdb -U postgres transaction_db
scripts.db:drop: docker-compose exec db dropdb -U postgres transaction_db
scripts.db:test:create: docker-compose exec db createdb -U postgres transaction_db_test
scripts.db:test:drop: docker-compose exec db dropdb -U postgres transaction_db_test
scripts.migrate: docker-compose run app npx typeorm-ts-node-commonjs migration:run -d ./ormconfig.ts
scripts.migrate:test: docker-compose run -e NODE_ENV=test app npx typeorm-ts-node-commonjs migration:run -d ./ormconfig.ts
scripts.migration:create: docker-compose run app npx typeorm-ts-node-commonjs migration:create
